alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 7:56PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Polk, Grand Forks, Walsh and Marshall Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Grand Forks and Polk Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Marshall, Walsh, Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Pembina. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.6 feet, MN 175 bridge (south of Pembina and north of Drayton) approaches flood (MN DOT). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 46.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:30 PM CDT Saturday was 46.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 46.4 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 39.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
